headline.main: STEUBEN SOCIETY STAND; T.H. Hoffman Says It Will Fight War, but Backs America

abstract: Steuben Soc stand against war entry propaganda but backing U S in case of war given by T H Hoffmann; Roosevelt, Hull and Knox denounced by Gayda and Ital press
snippet: Steuben Soc stand against war entry propaganda but backing U S in case of war given by T H Hoffmann; Roosevelt, Hull and Knox denounced by Gayda and Ital press...

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
